title: Bharat Innovation Fund: IIM-A incubator is betting big on deep-tech startups - The Financial Express
content: Bharat Innovation Fund: IIM-A incubator is betting big on deep-tech startups  The Financial Express
description: The three-year-old CIIE.CO-affiliated venture fund has invested in seven deep-tech and IP-focused startups so far, deploying almost 40% of its $100-million corpus
